Class Absence

java.lang.Object
model.Absence
public class Absence extends Object
Represents a student absence in the school management system.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description

  • Constructor Details

    • Absence

      public Absence(int studentId, Date absenceDate, String description, boolean status)
      Constructor for creating a new absence record.
      Parameters:
      studentId - The ID of the student who was absent
      absenceDate - The date of the absence
      description - A description of the absence
      status - The status of the absence (true = excused, false = unexcused)

    • Absence

      public Absence(int absenceId, int studentId, Date absenceDate, String description, boolean status)
      Constructor for existing absence records.
      Parameters:
      absenceId - The unique ID of the absence
      studentId - The ID of the student who was absent
      absenceDate - The date of the absence
      description - A description of the absence
      status - The status of the absence (true = excused, false = unexcused)
